channel.title: CVE Feed for Rob Marsh, SJ -- Post-Plugin Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rob Marsh, SJ -- Post-Plugin Library

item.title: CVE-2024-31085|2024-03-31T19:34:22.349Z -- Rob Marsh, SJ -- Post-Plugin Library
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Rob Marsh, SJ Post-Plugin Library allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post-Plugin Library: from n/a through 2.6.2.1.
